channel.title: CVE Feed for EC-CUBE CO.,LTD. -- EC-CUBE 2 series
channel.description: The latest CVEs for EC-CUBE CO.,LTD. -- EC-CUBE 2 series

item.title: CVE-2023-40281|2024-10-08T17:38:02.195Z -- ec-cube%20co.%2Cltd. -- ec-cube%202%20series
item.description: EC-CUBE 2.11.0 to 2.17.2-p1 contain a cross-site scripting vulnerability in "mail/template" and "products/product" of Management page. If this vulnerability is exploited, an arbitrary script may be executed on the web browser of the other administrator or the user who accessed the website using the product.
